thread.title: Indonesia Considers Allowing More Foreign Investment in Businesses
thread.title_full: Indonesia Considers Allowing More Foreign Investment in Businesses - WSJ

author: Sara Schonhardt
title: Indonesia Considers Allowing More Foreign Investment in Businesses
text:
JAKARTAâ€”Indonesia is considering revising its list of sectors in which it limits or prevents foreign investment to open investment in e-commerce, Communication and Information Minister Rudiantara said Friday, ahead of a visit by President Joko Widodo to the U.S.
Discussions on revising the list, which covers a number of sectors, come amid a series of government measures over the past month aimed at boosting investment in an economy...
